name: Archery Z - Destroy All Fruit
description:
grab your bow and arrow to play the best shooting games. Shoot the apple on the head of your friend. Be a good bowman, hit the right spot, pull arrow and release it on time for accurate shots.

***FEATURES***
- Ultimate archery tournaments with Archer!!!
- A new step in archery games.
- Realistic 3D graphics for real Apple Shoot impression.
- A complete bow and arrow game full of thriller, suspense, addictiveness and more!!!
- Get Ready for 50 Shooting Archery Challenges.
